mapper.select: SELECT TEMC.IDX AS MAIN_IDX, TESC.IDX AS SUB_IDX, CONCAT(TEMC.MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME, '-', TESC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME) AS CERTIFICATE_NAME FROM TB_EXAM_MAIN_CATEGORY AS TEMC JOIN TB_EXAM_SUB_CATEGORY AS TESC ON TEMC.IDX = TESC.MAIN_CATEGORY_IDX WHERE TEMC.USE_STATUS = 1 AND TESC.USE_STATUS = 1
SELECT IDX AS SUBJECT_IDX, SUBJECT_NAME FROM TB_EXAM_SUBJECT WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_IDX = #{subIdx} AND USE_STATUS = 1
SELECT IDX AS EXAM_IDX, EXAM_NAME FROM TB_EXAM WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_IDX = #{subIdx} AND USE_STATUS = 1
